metadata.title: Basic Plan of Action and Milestones

poam-items.title: Deficiency in ExampleCo Password Policy Implementation
poam-items.description: There is a deficiency in the implementation of the ExampleCo Password Policy that needs to be addressed.

observations.description: The ExampleCo Password Policy is not being enforced adequately across the enterprise.

risks.title: Increased Risk of Unauthorized Access
risks.description: The deficiency in the password policy implementation increases the risk of unauthorized access to ExampleCo systems.
risks.statement: If the password policy is not properly implemented, then there is a higher likelihood of unauthorized access due to weak passwords being trivially broken by brute force.
